name: igniteplate
tagline: A super awesome starter kit for your CI projects.
body:
If you are looking for a great starter project then this is definitely the place.

## Features

- Ready to use user registration and user login module created using Ion Auth.
- An awesome CSS framework â€“ [inuit.css](https://github.com/csswizardry/inuit.css)
- Very little inbuilt design which can be easily removed.
- Sparks

[![Project Status](http://stillmaintained.com/aniketpant/igniteplate.png)](https://stillmaintained.com/aniketpant/igniteplate)
